name: Hansar Bangkok

reviews.text: after having stayed at the hansar in bangkok already once, us very satisfied guests decided to return.
reviews.title: we did it again

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: our daughter and her fiance hadn't been to bangkok before, so we decided to return, coming from the hansar on samui, and, before flying home to europe, spend 3 nights at the hansar in bangkok and show the kids the city.
reviews.title: Best in bangkok

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: we had an edge-, and the kids a vertigo-suite - they loved it a lot, and were very excited about such an accomodation,
reviews.title: Totally and utterly outstanding

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: pick-up by hotel, a very friendly welcome, the bell boys ready to serve, check-in efficient, fast, briefing by some staff in rooms.
reviews.title: Modern boutique hotel

reviews.text: one reason why we love the hansar in bangkok is its vicinity to the skytrain - it takes you to many attractions in a short time, a great plus.
reviews.title: Bangkok Trip

reviews.text: The location is great and the room is really beautiful and big. Most important, all of the staff is great. The spa is also excellent. It's the best hotel I've ever stay in Bangkok! I would definitely stay in this hotel when I come to BKK next time. The staff at the front desk(especially Mr. Ping, Krung and Oh) are all lovely, friendly and clever. As for the room, normally I don't sleep well in hotels, but I slept really well in Hansar, I also like the green wall in our room. All in all, it's really an awesome and memorable experience to stay in Hansar Bankok.
reviews.title: REALLY AWESOME

reviews.text: Hansar Bangkok is a fantastic place to stay!
reviews.title: Amazing 5* plus hotel

reviews.text: In an ultra-central location (just a minute walk to the nearest BTS Station and a short walk to Central World) but amazingly in a quiet street, the hotel is 5* plus in every respect, from the stylish modern lobby to the hip yet understated rooms and the excellent pool area. We particularly loved the green eco friendly features including a green wall in our Edge Suite. Also probably the most comfortable bed we've ever slept in.
reviews.title: Perfect location and super cool design
Love their "green concept"!
reviews.text: What sets this hotel apart is the incredibly personal and genuine service from the hotel staff. A big shout out to Itti from the pool area who litterally saved our holiday with his quick and selfless action when my 2 year old daughter had an accident in the elevator. Everyone at the hotel including the senior managers were so concerned and apologetic even though it was just an accident and no damage done.

The hotel breakfast was first class. A very peaceful area to eat in, the food was high quality using top produce. Highly recommended. Very friendly but not overbearing waiters. We also ate at Zuma at the nearby St Regis which is a hip modern Japanese restaurant. Well worth trying out.
reviews.title: so friendly

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: I cant begin to song the praises of this hotel more. One of the nicest hotels that I have stayed in in a long time. Nestled just behind the Four Seasons and the Regis , the Hansar is a hidden gem ! Great central location...cab ride away from everywhere ! We stayed in a suite. We got a special deal on our stay so we were very pleased. I cannot think of one criticism ...not one ! The smallest one I could come up with would be the relatively weak signal on the WiFi. But that's it ! Reception/check in was courteous , efficient and professional. The rooms had everything. We couldn't think of one thing missing. ...from fully stocked fridge ( re-replenished daily ) ...shoe shine ..desk equipped with hole punch to paper clips... superb big bed...choice of pillows.... 2 nice big TV's ... individual setting for the AC in both the lounge area and bedroom...Comfy bathrobes and slippers ....Breakfast is great - good range of food, you can sit inside or outside, efficient service. ...The staff at the front desk Oh , Ping and Krung did everything for us...from booking a restaurant ..to taxis..to trips. Good work . I could really go on for ages.
reviews.title: A pure delight !

reviews.text: I will just say this '' STAY HERE''...you will not be disappointed.
reviews.title: the best boutique hotel

reviews.text: We will definitely be using the Hansar again when we return to Bangkok.
reviews.title: quite a faultless experience

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: And we will be looking to stay at other Hansar resorts on future trips
reviews.title: I really wanted to like this hotel but....

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Three nights in the Vertical Suite. Wow! Pretty stunning. From arrival to departure all our needs were met at the Hansar, Bangkok. Traveling with with two children under 10, my wife and I were mesmerized by the attentiveness of all staff. The modern architecturally designed lobby complimented the hip 'Savile Row' haute couture dressed welcoming staff. Beautifully appointed rooms consisting of a shower that made me rejoice with complete abandon. A buffet breakfast that satisfied all our families' needs. A great selection of western delights (eggs Benedict for moi'), accompanied by traditional Thai morning dishes.
reviews.title: Great experience.

reviews.text: The rooms are clean, new and warm. Reception was friendly. Services at bar and restaurant was prompt. Concerige were friendly and helpful. They are very updated and able to recommend what you are looking for with varieties nearby. One of the Concerige guy was good, his name is Lucky. He could remember that I was staying in the same hotel six months ago. The prices are reasonable for the comfort and luxury Hansard is providing. Location is convenient, there is a BTS when you walk out. The bed is big. Breakfast was good too.
reviews.title: Friendly and helpful and luxury

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel is amazing! From the moment you arrive you are treated like a 5* customer and the staff can't do enough for you, but manage to do this without being in your face - a rare quality.
reviews.title: Perfection

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The communal areas are immaculate and designed beautifully, as is the pool area.
reviews.title: Simply Loving It.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We had the most 'basic' room, but this was a luxurious suite in itself, along with one of the most comfortable beds I've ever slept in. They provide everything you need toiletries wise too, which is always helpful and the best slippers to cushion those weary feet!
reviews.title: Felt like we were the only guests!

reviews.text: In addition to this the hotel is the perfect place to escape the craziness that is Bangkok - our room on the 17th floor was so quiet, and along with the comfy bed, I had 3 amazing nights sleep!
reviews.title: Flawless in one of the most luxurious boutique hotels

description: Welcome to Hansar Bangkok, and unrivaled luxury experience just steps away from the heart of Bangkok and a short one-minute walk to the BTS Skytrain, yet nestled in the seclusion and comfort in Bangkok’s most prestigious location, Rajdamri Road.Endless and enchanting views of Bangkok greenery, unrivaled architectural elegance and timeless style, amenities to please the most discerning traveler, this is the Hansar way of life. Our suites are steeped in modern comfort and amenities, contemporary yet timeless in style and adorned in Jim Thompson silk.
